35fe9697-db4c-4b1b-b28b-a555d0f4cd67.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed a mentoring relationship by guiding and being an advisor for a student through problem solving, developing and working towards goals and by answering any questions or concerns the student might have with the purpose of accelerating development.
35fe9697-db4c-4b1b-b28b-a555d0f4cd67.name: Student Mentor

badge_template_activities.title: The mentor has been admitted to and followed through at least one mentoring relationship with a student. The mentor has been evaluated according to Scania´s verified evaluation method.

485043be-8b58-4d2e-8018-33c6e7387fb3.description: The 3MT exercise cultivates Ph.D. students’ academic, presentation, and research communication skills. The competition supports their capacity to effectively explain their research in three minutes, in a language that is appropriate for a non-specialist audience.
485043be-8b58-4d2e-8018-33c6e7387fb3.name: Scania Innovation Days - Three Minutes Thesis
